high_descs: Turn right, walk to the grey sofa, turn left, walk to the table at the end
Grab the book on the table
Turn around, walk to the grey sofa on the left
Put the book on the sofa
anns.task_desc: Move the book from the table by the window to the sofa

high_descs: turn to your right walk straight turn left when you get to the couch walk straight until you get to the table
pick up the book on the table
turn to your right turn to your right walk forward until you get to the end of the couch
put the book on the couch
anns.task_desc: robot should move the book to the couch

high_descs: Walk to the book on the table by the window.
Pick up the book from the table.
Turn around and walk to the sofa on the left.
Put the book on the sofa.
anns.task_desc: Move a book from a table to a sofa.
